channel.title: Broadband on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Broadband on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Starlink kept me connected to the Internet without fail—until Thursday
item.description: “Starlink went down across the entire front.”

item.title: California backs down to Trump admin, won’t force ISPs to offer $15 broadband
item.description: “Complete farce”: State lawmaker says US threatened to block broadband funding.

item.title: FCC to eliminate gigabit speed goal and scrap analysis of broadband prices
item.description: Analysis of broadband affordability deemed “extraneous” by FCC chair.

item.title: Amazon’s ride on the rocket merry-go-round continues with SpaceX launch
item.description: Amazon has launched 78 of its planned 3,232 Kuiper broadband satellites.

item.title: Two guys hated using Comcast, so they built their own fiber ISP
item.description: Brothers-in-law use construction knowledge to compete against Comcast in Michigan.
